useCase.name: Create New Type of Test
useCase.description: User wants to create a new type of test.

preconditions.precondition: Administrator is logged in and has permission to create a new type of test.

successEndConditions.condition: New type of test is successfully created.

failureEndConditions.condition: Creation of new type of test fails.

mainSequence.step: Administrator asks to create a new type of test. [Actor: Administrator]
List of parameter categories is fetched. [Actor: User Interface]
User Interface shows parameter category list and asks to select one. [Actor: Administrator]
Administrator selects a parameter category. [Actor: Administrator]
Requests data (description, collecting method, code). [Actor: Administrator]
User types requested data. [Actor: User Interface]
Data is shown and confirmation is requested. [Actor: Administrator]
All data is saved and operation success is informed. [Actor: User Interface]
